rules_text:
[i]Hinamatsuri[/i] – When Hina enters and at the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 colorless Doll artifact creature token.
[i]Nagashi-bina[/i] – Whenever one or more Dolls you control attack, put a shield counter on up to one other target non-Doll creature. [i](If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]
